title: We Need Your Help Clearing This Music Teacher's Wish List!
description:
Teachers - The Bert Show wants to help clear your wishlist! And if you're looking for today's wish list, scroll down!
Do you have an Amazon wishlist of supplies you need for your students or classroom? Call 1-844-827-8368 and leave us a voicemail telling us about yourself, what grade you teach (and give a shout out to your school if you want!), a general idea about your needs, and why we should highlight your wishlist.
If selected, we will put your list out there to our Bert show fam and we can all help you "Clear The List!"
Once again, that number is 1-844-827-8368. Call and leave us a message!
JENNIFER WITTER FROM STEELTON-HIGHSPIRE ELEMENTARY
Jennifer is a music teacher with something on her list that is a rite of passage for every elementary school kid!
She is hoping to build a collection of recorders, the equivalent of two class sets, for use in her 3rd and 4th grade music classes.
A recorder is the most cost efficient, most accessible first instrument for a child to learn the basics of rhythmic and musical notation skills that can be carried for a lifetime.
Will you please help Jennifer Witter out by buying one or two items off her classroom wish list? THANK YOU Bert Show Fam!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
